definition: A place where vehicles are repaired and maintained, typically operated by skilled professionals. It is commonly sought after by individuals experiencing issues with their cars or in need of regular servicing.

examples.german: Ich habe mein Auto in die Autowerkstatt gebracht.
examples.english: I brought my car to the car repair shop.

examples.german: Die Autowerkstatt hat den Motor meines Autos repariert.
examples.english: The car repair shop repaired the engine of my car.

examples.german: Mein Vater arbeitet in einer Autowerkstatt.
examples.english: My father works in a car repair shop.

examples.german: Die Autowerkstatt hat mir einen Kostenvoranschlag gegeben.
examples.english: The car repair shop gave me a cost estimate.

examples.german: Ich muss mein Auto zur Autowerkstatt schleppen lassen.
examples.english: I have to have my car towed to the car repair shop.
